mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free_board ( title, content, writer, image_name ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{imageName} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.image_name AS imageName, DATE_FORMAT(f.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdAt, f.view_count AS viewCount, u.nickname AS writerNickname FROM free_board f JOIN users u ON f.writer = u.id ORDER BY f.created_at DESC

SELECT f.id, f.title, f.content, f.writer, f.image_name AS imageName, DATE_FORMAT(f.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt, f.view_count AS viewCount, u.nickname AS writerNickname FROM free_board f JOIN users u ON f.writer = u.id WHERE f.id = #{id}
